description: This file defines a 'Home' component for a LightningJS-based Todo List frontend. It manages rendering the UI, handling user interactions, and maintaining state such as todos and filters. It imports external modules for UI components and persistent storage functions.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: A LightningJS component that serves as the main interface for a Todo List application, including UI layout, state management, and user interaction handlers.

methods.name: $onToggle
methods.description: Handles toggling the completion status of a todo item.

methods.name: $onEdit
methods.description: Handles editing the text of a todo item.

methods.name: setFilter
methods.description: Sets the current filter ('all', 'active', 'completed') and saves it.

methods.name: addTodoInternal
methods.description: Adds a new todo item with the provided text.

methods.name: $addTodo
methods.description: Triggers adding a new todo using the current input text.

methods.name: clearCompleted
methods.description: Removes all completed todos from the list.
